title: Mysterious laugh.

embed.description: NOTE: This is apost - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out.] [ STATUS: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
So there's a strange laugh that just showed up in PBE. Happens once a game, and it's only when you die, or laugh in the river.

Gangplank update? Zac skin? New water-themed champion? All bets are off, ladies and gentlemens. 

My dreams of playing a giant evil lobster approaches. Or does it? Ekko's been out for what, a week? Then again, Riot did this at the end of last year: five champions in extremely short times. Also, Bard was teased before even his teaser: little symbols appeared at certain places. It was cool. I still want a tank lobster. [His shell, as a passive, prevents critical hits.](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Shell_Armor_(Ability))

Zac skin? We all waited for one for a long time, and spooky water Zac could fit the bill. How long as it been since the last legendary skin, though? Not so long, Call of Yordle: Mushroom Warfare was here a bit before Urf. A ultimate skin could also be surprising, considering how long it takes between one another.

GP update? I doubt it. I can't explain it, just a feeling in me guts, yarr.

What do you guys think?

replies.body: **{{champion:99}} laugh* *
http://i.imgur.com/WZAawn7.gif
Thank you for nightmares
WE'VE BEEN HAD! ABORT THE POST.

Skarner is a scorpion you uneducated walnut
I sense a skin coming...
Lobster pure tank. Skarner's a bruiser. Also, Taco the Dragon gave another point.
It could be hinting at the urgot{{champion:6}}  rework, they mentioned something about it being a sion-type of rework

Too soon for Urgot, if you ask me.
Poppy's going to be first for the Sion-level rework, that one is certain. Urgot will most likely follow, but until then, i doubt we'll hear from him.

{{champion:6}}  is still very amusing to play mid. Not something you'd consider maining in ranked, but certainly fun and viable. I'll have a good time with him before he gets reworked, that's for sure. Love the damag3e and tankyness, and he's a good option against pricks like Zed and Yasuo. Makes them think twice before attacking.

My guess would be Rhaa'tul the speculated Darkin Bowman.

If not, then I guess I'm wrong and will suicide into Nexus.
I way playing Rengar, and in the game I laughed in the river. I heard the mysterios laugh. It's the river king, Tahm Kench.

https://www.facebook.com/lolopgg/videos/vb.470756562961560/874144979289381/?type=2&theater 

No need to thank me

A certain leak claims this is the Gangplank rework.
I guess i was wrong. Then again, this IS a leak, so not a viable source. 

Fun fact, i started watching House of Cards a few weeks ago. Great serie. Sometimes, they intentionally leak things, for various goals. Not claiming illuminati yet, but this is fun to think about.

Either way, i guess i never really wanted a Gangplank rework. I had fun stacking money with him and criting with Q. Guess we can't all have our fun, can we? Just messing with you, i'm a tank player, not a carry, but i do want a lobster tank.
Consider this idea, Riot. Pincers of CC doom.
Maybe that's where {{champion:45}}'s laugh on ult kill went
The laugh.. it's... the "summoner" xD
I think it's a prelude to a Bilgewater event.
All of the laughs have bubbling in the background...
Looks like GC went down on champ design. New crab champion confirmed... and it will be a support.

The first laugh (Where jayce suicided) sounds like more like graves' laugh. 
The second one might be gp? idk about that one in the river
